name: The OverGrowth
description:
platform around and grow plants to reach the goal. Press q (share/select) to get back to the menu screen and use E (options/start) to restart the level. collect flowers to gain water and press down or S (or square/X) to shoot it out. climb trees with up or W (X/A), use the left joystick to move. The saw flowers kill you and the ones at the end move you to the next level. this game is completely controller compatible and was made in a single day for the Kenny jam 2022. The sounds are from Mixkit and the art is from Kenny but all the code and small art edits were made by me, Lavaflowgames. please rate this game, post feedback, follow me on itch.io, and check out my youtube channel or even subscribe.

  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOKy4KrnkaOtsWJiCh14R_w
